## VaultKeeper.init() method

Initialize a new VaultKeeper instance. Runs doctor checks (unless skipped), loads config, and sets up the key manager.

**Signature:**

```typescript
static init(options?: VaultKeeperOptions): Promise<VaultKeeper>;
```
